Topic Summary: This appeal relates to a claim for relief in accordance with Part 10 Chapter 11 of the , Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 as amended (‘TCA 1997’). It involves a claim for travel expenses claimed as a rental income deduction pursuant to section 97(2) TCA 1997.
Tax Legislation: Section  372AK – 372AV Taxes Consolidation Act 1997; Section 384, 81, and 97 Taxes Consolidation Act 1997Taxes Consolidation Act 1997
